briefDescription: Muktangan is the sole initiative of Paragon Charitable Trust, a registered charity. Muktanganâ€™s innovative educational model integrates school and Teacher Education addressing the quality gap in the mainstream system. Its community based, inclusive, child-centered model has evolved over 13 years in our teacher education centre and our 7 English medium Municipal Schools in Mumbai. We offer quality holistic education for approximately 3400 children from low-income communities and have so far trained and employed approximately 475 women from the same communities as the children.
